attributes.action: Stop the charging of motorbikes in the borough of Westminster
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Charging has recently started for motorbikes and scootors in the borough of Westminster and Chelsea.
Many like myself did the motorbike test specifically to reduce costs incurred by such things as parking and the congestion charge.
I think this is a disgracful addition to an otherwise already busy town.

Please think about this.....

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
